recipes.title: Tomato Spaghetti
recipes.content: Boil pasta, cook bacon, mix eggs and cheese...

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.content: Chop lettuce, add dressing, mix croutons...

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.content:
1. In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
2. In another bowl, whisk together milk, eggs, and melted butter.
3. Combine the wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
4. Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
5. Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
6. Serve warm with syrup or your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.content:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
2. In a bowl, whisk eggs, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
3. Cook diced pancetta or bacon in a skillet until crispy.
4. Drain the pasta, reserving some pasta water.
5. Toss hot pasta with the egg mixture and pancetta, adding pasta water as needed.
6. Serve immediately, topped with extra cheese.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.content:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cream butter, sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Mix in eggs and vanilla extract.
4. Gradually add flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in chocolate chips.
5. Scoop dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
6. Let cool slightly before serving.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.content:
1. Toast a slice of bread to your desired crispness.
2. Mash a ripe avocado with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
3. Spread the mashed avocado onto the toast.
4. Add toppings like a poached egg, sliced tomato, or chili flakes.
5. Drizzle with olive oil for extra flavor.
6. Enjoy immediately!

recipes.title: Homemade Pizza
recipes.content:
1. Preheat your oven to the highest temperature.
2. Roll out pizza dough and place it on a baking tray.
3. Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
4. Add your favorite toppings and shredded cheese.
5. Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and crispy.
6. Slice and serve hot.

recipes.title: Banana Smoothie
recipes.content:
1. Peel and slice a ripe banana.
2. Add the banana, milk, yogurt, and honey to a blender.
3. Add a handful of ice cubes for a cold, refreshing drink.
4. Blend until smooth and creamy.
5. Pour into a glass and garnish with a slice of banana.
6. Serve immediately and enjoy!
